testcase.brief: TFTP(RRQ mode) enable alg influence on network Firewall rules
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -Configure AP Enable 1 dhcp server（mgt0.1） Mgt0.1 vlan10 IPaddr 10.1.10.1 gateway 10.1.10.1 Laptop1 connect to Mgt0.1 IPaddr 10.1.10.2 AP get IPaddr(interface wan) <IP1> from server -Configure Server Enable TFTP function RRQ mode
Test Procedure: 1) Configure network firewall rule "network-firewall name 1001 to network 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.255 service ftp action permit logging off" "network-firewall name 1002 from any to any action deny logging off" 2) Laptop1 uses TFTP connect to server and download/upload files

step.desc: Configure AP Enable 1 dhcp server（mgt0.1） Mgt0.1 vlan10 IPaddr 10.1.10.1 gateway 10.1.10.1 Laptop1 connect to Mgt0.1 IPaddr 10.1.10.2
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable" -v "dns server-ip ${pub.dns1.ip}"

step.desc: Set interface eth0 to wan mode,eth1/eth2 to access mode and enable mac-learning
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side

Configure network firewall rule “network-firewall name 1001 to network 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.255 service tftp action permit logging off” “network-firewall name 1002 from any to any action deny logging off”
step.telnet: -v "network-firewall name 1001 service tftp action permit logging on" -v "network-firewall name 1002 service icmp action permit logging on" -v "network-firewall name 1003 from any to any action deny logging on" -v "_ff id 1 dst-ip ${pub.tftp1.tip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: Laptop1 uses tftp connect to server and download file
